title: Can anyone help me with my client?

embed.description: I've uninstalled it, and reinstalled it. Didn't work. Tried to launch it on the legacy and on the new client, didn't work.

body: I've uninstalled it, and reinstalled it. Didn't work. Tried to launch it on the legacy and on the new client, didn't work.

replies.body: It looks like something is blocking the client from opening up,and that can be caused by a few things.  There could be another program or setting that is blocking it from opening, and needs to be configured to allow access.  It could also be a network issue that's failing to reach the login servers.  As a first step, I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which should help troubleshoot those problem areas.  Let me know if that helps!
Thanks! I got it. Updated my antivirus software and it worked.
